com.facebook.buck.rules

Interface ConstructorArg

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AndroidBinaryDescription.Arg, AndroidBuildConfigDescription.Arg, AndroidInstrumentationApkDescription.Arg, AndroidLibraryDescription.Arg, AndroidManifestDescription.Arg, AndroidPrebuiltAarDescription.Arg, AndroidResourceDescription.Arg, ApkGenruleDescription.Arg, AppleAssetCatalogDescription.Arg, AppleBundleDescription.Arg, AppleNativeTargetDescriptionArg, AppleResourceDescription.Arg, AppleTestDescription.Arg, BuckExtensionDescription.Arg, CoreDataModelDescription.Arg, CxxBinaryDescription.Arg, CxxLibraryDescription.Arg, ExportFileDescription.Arg, GenAidlDescription.Arg, GenParcelableDescription.Arg, GenruleDescription.Arg, GwtBinaryDescription.Arg, IosPostprocessResourcesDescription.Arg, JavaBinaryDescription.Args, JavaLibraryDescription.Arg, JavaTestDescription.Arg, JavaThriftLibraryDescription.Arg, KeystoreDescription.Arg, NdkLibraryDescription.Arg, PrebuiltJarDescription.Arg, PrebuiltNativeLibraryDescription.Args, ProjectConfigDescription.Arg, PythonBinaryDescription.Arg, PythonLibraryDescription.Arg, PythonTestDescription.Arg, RobolectricTestDescription.Arg, ShBinaryDescription.Arg, ShTestDescription.Arg, XcodeNativeDescription.Arg, XcodeProjectConfigDescription.Arg, XcodeWorkspaceConfigDescription.Arg

    public interface ConstructorArg
    Marker interface for java objects that acts as arguments to ConstructorArgMarshaller. The constructor arg is examined for public fields. Reflection is used to determine the type of the field, and it's possible to indicate that a field isn't mandatory by using Optional declarations. If the name of the property to be exposed to a build file does not match the field name, then a Hint can be used to set it. As an example, the arguments for a build target defined as: 
        example_library(
      name = 'example',
      srcs = [ '//foo:bar', 'Eggs.java', ],
      optional_thing = True,
    )
    Could be defined as a constructor arg that looks like: 
         public class ExampleLibraryArg {
       public String name;
       public ImmutableSortedSet>SourcePath> srcs;
       @Hint(name = "optional_thing")
       public Optional>Boolean> isNeeded;
     }
    Values for individual fields are coerced from the java object representations of the json generated by the python build rules by instances of TypeCoercer. See TypeCoercerFactory supported types, and how the type coercer is picked given an input type.
